comments:
Eclipse 3.1M6, JDK 1.5.0_02.  Create a java project with separate src and bin
folder, import simple-core-2.5.4 from simpleweb.sf.net.  Select src folder and
choose "Refactor|Infer ..." from context menu, click Preview>.

I just found out: it's the class simple.http.load.PrefixResolver which causes
the initial internal error.  Hope that helps...

I can't look at foreign source code (licensing ...), but from the stacktrace,
I'm pretty sure comment 0 is a dup of bug 90880 (which has been fixed in HEAD
some hours ago).

I'll have to look into the NPE from comment 1.
Sorry, I probably won't have time to look at this for 3.1.

From looking at the stacktrace, I'm pretty sure the NPE from comment 1 does not
occur any more in 3.1 RC2.

Closing as WORKSFORME. Please reopen if you still see this in a recent build.

I tried to reproduce the problem and can confirm that it also works for me with
3.1 RC2. Thanks.
Cool, thanks for your quick confirmation.
